pullRequest.body:
We add a constructor for properties of affine morphisms of schemes satisfying a given property of ring homomorphisms on sections.

---

Please ask for help on https://leanprover.zulipchat.com if needed.

To indicate co-authors, include lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Co-authored-by: Author Name <author@email.com>

If you are moving or deleting declarations, please include these lines at the bottom of the commit message

- ...

Deletions:

- ...

below the `---`, and placed outside this HTML comment, or else they

### PR summary [7f0eb58c11](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/pull/18356/commits/7f0eb58c11e9181f62698cfb0848c9244ccbfbbd)

#### Import changes for modified files

No significant changes to the import graph


<details><summary>Import changes for all files</summary>

|Files|Import difference|
|-|-|
| `Mathlib.AlgebraicGeometry.Morphisms.AffineAnd`|1757|

</details>

---

<details><summary>

#### Declarations diff

</summary>

`+ HasAffineProperty.affineAnd_containsIdentities`
`+ HasAffineProperty.affineAnd_iff`
`+ HasAffineProperty.affineAnd_isStableUnderComposition`
`+ HasAffineProperty.affineAnd_le_isAffineHom`
`+ HasAffineProperty.affineAnd_stableUnderBaseChange`
`+ RingHom.OfLocalizationSpan.ofIsLocalization`
`+ RingHom.OfLocalizationSpan.ofIsLocalization'`
`+ affineAnd`
`+ affineAnd_apply`
`+ affineAnd_isLocal`
`+ affineAnd_respectsIso`
`+ affineAnd_stableUnderBaseChange`
`+ appBasicOpenIsoAwayMap`
`+ app_basicOpen_eq_away_map`
`+ targetAffineLocally_affineAnd_iff`
<details>
  <summary>You can run this locally as follows</summary>


```bash
## summary with just the declaration names:
./scripts/declarations_diff.sh <optional_commit>

## more verbose report:

```
</details>

The doc-module for `script/declarations_diff.sh` contains some details about this script.

</details>
ðŸš€ Pull request has been placed on the maintainer queue by erdOne.

Pull request successfully merged into master.

Build succeeded:
  * [Build](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/11627982457/job/32382306116)
  * [Lint style](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/11627982457/job/32382305741)

Thanks a lot for doing this!
maintainer merge

Thanks a lot for doing this!
maintainer merge
I don't think we should state things in terms of `forall U : X.affineOpens`.

Hmm, I think I can see why, but we do it in many places, e.g. everything around `HasRingHomProperty` is expressed like that (probably because of [AlgebraicGeometry.affineLocally_iff_affineOpens_le](https://leanprover-community.github.io/mathlib4_docs/Mathlib/AlgebraicGeometry/Morphisms/RingHomProperties.html#AlgebraicGeometry.affineLocally_iff_affineOpens_le)). I don't care which way we do it, but we should do it consistently.
Yeah we should probably fix that as well.
Okay aligned now with the def of `IsAffineHom`.
I think this HasAffineProperty should not be an instance argument and a regular argument instead since we will not have these instances lying around.

Random thought: Maybe the condition should be `(fr : Rr -> Sr) (_ : fr.comp (algebraMap R Rr) = (algebraMap S Sr).comp f : P fr` instead of using `Away.map` so that you can skip the `arrow_mk_iso` yoga later on?
I added your version, because I can imagine it being helpful, but I did not figure out a quick way to make use of it in the application here.

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - feat(AlgebraicGeometry/Morphisms): affine + ring hom property
